reviews.review: Yet again bhvr is doing something that ruins the game and also the environment. What a combo! It feels like they are trying to one up themselves. I know that there are good people at bhvr but holy shit does the bad out weight the good. Whoever is running the show is really trying his / her best to make the game unplayable and suck all the goodwill out of the players by supporting nfts. I thought i would never see the day this game would support nfts but i guess its a new low for them. I would say boycott the game but it seems that it just doesnt even matter anymore. What i will say is please play VHS or Propnight. We need to actively show bhvr that this is unacceptable and that other games will overtake them.

Es un juego duro para los nuevos jugadores, especialmente si empiezas como asesino, el ente no perdona. Pero si supieras esas primeras 30 o 40 horas de juego la cosa cambia. 

El PvP asimétrico a veces puede sentirse desbalanceado y resultar frustrante, pero la diversión que te puede dar el juego y los momentos de satisfacción suprema cuando tu plan sale bien lo compensan.

Nota: Recomiendo a los jugadores noveles que se miren un par de gameplays primero para pillar algunos conceptos básicos.

Токсичное комьюнити, хиты через пол карты, убогая система рангов, разработчики, которые не могут в сроки выпустить обнову, куча багов, фиксы, которые убирают 1 старый баг и добавляют 10 новых...это и есть основная составляющая ДБД. Но тем не менее, несмотря на все эти недостатки, я люблю эту игру, по крайней мере за её уникальность. Да, есть много похожих игр, которые вышли после неё, вспомнить ту же Пятницу 13 или бесплатный Deceit, а скоро выйдет ещё и Last year, но они не дотягивают до уровня ДБД, да и живут они недолго. Плюс в ДБД имеется множество различных маньяков и выживших, каждый со своими уникальными умениями и способностями. Есть контент как лицензионный("Кошмар на улице Вязов" , "Хеллоуин" , "Крик" , "Очень странные дела" и т.д.),так и придуманный самими разработчиками(особенно хочу выделить главу с духом, и предстоящую главу с Они). Все это делает каждую катку уникальной, в связи с этим игра не надоедает. Но все же хочется чего-то кардинально нового, добавления нового режима, изменения системы рангов. Сейчас разработчики пытаются разнообразить игру добавлением новых вариаций для карт, что я считаю довольно неплохо, но этого мало. На этом всё, игру рекомендую(нет).

这款游戏可玩性较高，很多我们熟系的各种角色。画面优化也不错。
虽然玩屠夫经常四跑，玩求生者至今还没有跑出去过一次，但是过一段时间总会上线玩一局。游戏对于新人确实不友好，没技能确实很难受，但是如果只是休闲的话，总能在一局游戏中找到点什么有意思的事情。我觉得现在过于强调游戏输赢，反而会丢掉很多纯粹的乐趣。

I've been following since before release, have it on XBox and PC. Play on Xbox a lot more, friends are there.
Game USED to be a ton of fun. However, with them bringing in new characters, the Killers seems to get more and more overpowered and basically you just can't win against them unless they literally have 2 braincells.

Like the Pig is undetectable when crouching and then sprints faster that the victims.
Kruger is undetectable then you hear music for a split second and BAM, asleep and he sees you everywhere with limited ways to wake up.
Myers just has basically no terror radius and can 1 hit victims after like 4 min in the game.

Just so many killers make is essentially unplayable since you cant ban or avoid certain Killers to have a sort of enjoyable game.

I just wish they could balance this game because I really do love the idea for this game.
Used to be great with like 1-2 Friends, running around screaming and having panic attacks from dodging and getting away from the killers.

Everyone knows what Dead by Daylight is so, I am not going to waste your time talking about what the game is. I do want to talk about the "Port" to the PC. LAZY is the word for it. It's locked to 60 Fps, for some that's fine but, If you are running on a monitor with a high refresh rate like 100HZ or 144Hz it will feel sluggish. 

There are pretty much NO graphic options so, if you have trouble running the game tough sh*t lol, there isn't anything you can do besides adjust the resolution scaling & change the graphics quality from Low, Med, High & Ultra. 

I can't recommend this game cause of the port it's quite annoying I can't support devs that think it's okay to just take the sh*t console version & throw it on the PC with the mentality "It will run, sell it." & that's what I see here. It's a pass for me.
The game is really exciting and at times scary,i recommend people to get this game.Also don't be toxicccc :))))))

Always nerve racking as a survivor. Love the tension of trying to escape. Haven't gotten a chance to play as a killer yet but just from the survivor side love this game.

If you think CS:GO toxic, try this game.

This is simultaneously the most fun, and most infuriating game I've played in a long time.

It's an asymmetrical game where one player is a powerful killer, hunting down 4 elusive survivors before they can start generators and leave the trial.

For an asymmetrical game, it's in a state where it's surprisingly balanced between the two sides. Either side has a few things that infuriate the other and certain killers are notoriously overpowered, or underpowered. Freddy Kreuger mains, for instance, must hate themselves to play that, and Nurse mains must just hate playing the game fairly.

New content is regular, 1 killer, 1 survivor, 3 perks for each side, and a map are released every 3 months or so, mid chapter balance patches occur, and cosmetics are regularly added. Recent content additions have, however, cut back on content. A new map hasn't been added with the last 2 additions, each of which only contained 1 character. They have also dropped the term "paragraph" which used to refer to 1 character being added and now refer to all DLC as "chapters," meaning their roadmap now suddenly promises a lot less future content. They are also reworking an old tileset to have "5 different configurations" changing the layout but using the same buildings, meaning much less variation than original tilesets that have 5 completely unique maps built on them.

Recent killer additions have been mediocre at best. The Legion (Dec 2018) was released and completely changed the chase dynamics for the killer, which was blatantly broken and had very little counterplay. They were soon nerfed into a state where they barely feel like they have a power any more. Since then, the Plague (Mar 2019) and the Ghost Face (June 2019) have powers that are overwhelmingly controlled by the survivor players more than the killer, making them incredibly frustrating and unrewarding to play. Due to their mistakes with Legion they seem scared to release killers that actually feel decent in the meta. Only one "strong" killer has been added in the last 2 years.

There are downsides however. While balance patches come regularly, they won't do anything incremental. Freddy is ridiculously weak, but they refuse to give him small quality of life changes that they have said he needs until they are ready to release a full rework of him. Meaning rather than sitting at a 'meh' stage, he sits in boring, weak and generally unfun. His upcoming rework has finally been announced in (some) detail, which, going off the most recent version we've heard, leaves a lot to be desired.

Pay to pay to keep paying. Buying the game will net you around one third of the cast. Many are also available through grinding, however licensed killers and survivors require further payment. Their perks are also locked to you, unless they are picked on the "random" weekly shrine. (The good ones rarely are.) On top of this, despite in game currency being used for cosmetics, anything they think looks good or will be popular is locked behind payment only. It's a ♥♥♥♥ move when you may have already spent upwards of $80 just to unlock characters.

Great game.
Jogo bom para jogar com amigos e se dirvertir. Recomendo.

Buen juego, aunque con el tiempo que tiene el juego, los jugadores veteranos tienen muchas ventajas sobre los novatos, así que ellos tendrán que adaptarse rápido o ver guías para poder tener una oportunidad contra ellos ya sea por youtubers o consejos en los foros.

Ein gutes Spiel, das immer wieder mehr Kontent bekommt, wodurch das Spiel bereichert wird. Es ist super, dass man sowohl als Gruppe als auch allein gut spielen kann. Es ist generell spannender für mich Killer zu spielen, da diese einfach einzigartigere Fähigkeiten haben und es deshalb auch abwechslungsreicher macht. Aber dafür ist Survivor spielen meist ganz entspannt, sobald man erstmal in das Spiel rein gefunden hat. Also es macht lange Spaß und man hat viel Raum sich zu verbessern. Trotzdem ist es auch beim Einstieg relativ freundlich. (Ich empfehle auch wenn man nur Survivor spielen möchte Killerrunden zu machen, da diese einem viel einsicht geben, wie man sich um ihn herum bewegen muss). Die dedicated Server und der Season pass sind eine extreme Bereicherung.
Nun zu den negativen Aspekten: Das matchmaking ist oft garbage und trotzdem wartet man oft ewig auf Lobbys. Dann spielst du mit Leuten 5 Ränge über oder unter dir. Die Menschen sind toxic. Man kann kaum 2 Spiele spielen ohne dass einer ragequittet. Es ist nicht wirklich balanced. Natürlich ist kein asymmetrisches Spiel ganz balanced, aber vor allem als Killer gibt es ziemlich bald perks, die einfach ein must-have sind. Wie hex:ruin oder BBQ&chilli. Es ist blutig und am Anfang sehr erschreckend. Zumindest ich hab auch immer noch bei bestimmten Killern Schockmomente. Also etwas schwieriger wenn man schreckhaft ist. Und ja gegen gewaltätige Szenen sollte man nicht empfindlich sein. Auch eine Warnung, dass es einen schnell tilten kann. Es ist nicht ohne Grund eine toxic community. Manchmal hat man 5 Games hintereinander, wo der killer tunnelt und facecamped oder die Survivor einen nur loopen. Macht dann keinen Spaß.... Es gibt keinen wirklichen unranked Modus. Man kann Lobbys nur mit Freunden spielen, aber sonst ist es quasi unmöglich einfach mal ein paar Trollgames zu machen ohne Rang zu verlieren. Nicht dass der Rang irgendetwas bringen würde. Keine Belohnung oder ähnliches außer einem Steam-achievement. Außerdem läuft manchmal die Musik noch weiter nach dem Schließen. Und wenn Steam down ist funktioniert auch das Spiel nicht...

+
Durch regelmäßige Patches durchgehende Spielverbesserung
Alleine und mit Freunden spielbar
Verschiedene Spielerfahrungen sammeln durch Survivor und Killer
Einzigartige Charaktere (Killer)
Lange Spielmotivation
Relativ einsteigerfreundlich
Ingame Belohnungen durch Season pass (noch sehr neu)

-
Toxic Community (viele Leaver)
Viel Tiltpotenzial
Balanceprobleme sowohl bei Perks als auch beim Spielprinzip
Schlechtes Matchmaking (dauert lange und trotzdem oft keine Spieler mit gleichem Rang)
kein unranked mode
Keine Rangbelohnungen
(Gewaltätig und mit Jump-scare-Momenten)
Egal wie gut man ist es gibt keine Rangbelohnung
